title: New: Kailee Morgue – Medusa
body:
Super slick debut here from Phoenix’s **Kailee Morgue**.

Elements of everyone from Sigrid to Sylvan Esso, it’s easy to hear why a snippet of the track went viral last year, prompting her signing to Republic Records. Now based in LA, _Medusa_ is the first taste of official music from the nineteen year old, and is a truly captivating listen. Pop enough to find itself radio placements, whilst still cool enough to really feel like it’s caring out it’s own niche. Check it out below.
